name: Grandpa·爷爷
description:
This is a prototype originally designed for MOBILE platforms.

Take care of your grandpa and finish 3 tasks each day!

*The tasks will only be updated at 00:00 each day, but if you really want to skip the waiting (not recommended) and chat more with your grandpa, you can go for the cheat mode.

Currently, only 2 days are finished

Some important notes:

    •  Please press F to flip. (For the computer versions)
    • To clear previously stored data, click on the middle part of the start menu and press the red button
    • Please connect to the internet if possible
    • Some visual effects do not work well on the WebGL version, so playing locally is recommended

Good luck and plz give a little patience to your grandpa and the game :)
